title: Video: Shabazz Palaces – Black Up
body:
_Black Up_ was one of 2011’s sonic anomalies.

What is it? I still don’t know, attempting to wrap my head around its madness. To aid my plight, **Sub Pop** have handily uploaded an ecstatic pastiche of the album in moving visual form, and it’s breathtaking.

I can’t explain it much in words, more in facial features, which is a bit of a problem when trying to type an article. I’ll let you decide what you think. Ladies and gentleboys, as I’m sure you’re aware, this is **Shabazz Palaces**…
